title: Inactive names
body: Can someone help me in where to go if i want an account name thats in use already but has been inactive in a very long time. Much appreciated

replies.body: Or you could be creative and think of something else. I also use nouns instead of English phrases or other non-noun words. For 13 years I have not had one issue with a name in gaming.
If the player is level 30, he will have to be inactive for 2 years and 6 months.

Every summoner name is protected by [clean up ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-)for a certain amount of time.  We have no visible way to show when a name is available, so you'll have to keep trying in the name change store.  Sorry about that!
So how long do i have to wait? Is like a year and a couple of months long enough?
